column3: I act  in revision and set aside the  suspended sentences  imposed on

column2: Imprisonment  for  charge  1,  charge  3  and  charge  5  each  and  ten  years

column4: Imprisonment  for  charge  2,  charge  4  and  charge  6  each.  I

column2: further order to run the sentences concurrently.

column3: I  do  not  incline to  change the  fines  and the  compensation ordered

column2: by the Learned High Court Judge.

column3: The revision application allowed. No costs.
